code:
flowchart TD
    Start([ADT Event]) --> Type{Event Type?}
    Type -- Admit --> Method{Method?}
    Method -- Manual --> Search[Search Patient]
    Method -- Barcode --> Scan[Scan Wristband]
    Method -- Push --> Receive[Receive from Central]
    Search --> Lookup[Lookup in HIS]
    Scan --> Extract[Extract MRN]
    Extract --> Lookup
    Lookup --> Found{Found?}
    Found -- No --> Error[Show Error]
    Error --> End([ADT Complete])
    Found -- Yes --> Preview[Show Preview]
    Receive --> Preview
    Preview --> Confirm{Confirm?}
    Confirm -- No --> Cancel[Cancel]
    Cancel --> End
    Confirm -- Yes --> Associate[Associate Patient]
    Associate --> LogAdmit[Log Admission]
    LogAdmit --> UpdateUI[Update Banner]
    UpdateUI --> Admitted[Status: ADMITTED]
    Admitted --> End
    Type -- Discharge --> ConfirmDC{Confirm?}
    ConfirmDC -- No --> Cancel
    ConfirmDC -- Yes --> Clear[Clear Association]
    Clear --> LogDC[Log Discharge]
    LogDC --> Retain[Retain Data]
    Retain --> Standby[Status: STANDBY]
    Standby --> End
    Type -- Transfer --> DCSource[Discharge Source]
    DCSource --> AdmitTarget[Admit Target]
    AdmitTarget --> LogXfer[Log Transfer]
    LogXfer --> End
